AddHDMInstance.title: AddHDMInstance
AddHDMInstance.summary: Adds a database instance to Database Autonomy Service (DAS).

CreateKillInstanceSessionTask.title: CreateKillInstanceSessionTask
CreateKillInstanceSessionTask.summary: Creates a task that terminates sessions.

CreateLatestDeadLockAnalysis.title: CreateLatestDeadLockAnalysis
CreateLatestDeadLockAnalysis.summary: Creates a recent deadlock analysis task.

CreateQueryOptimizeTag.title: CreateQueryOptimizeTag
CreateQueryOptimizeTag.summary: Adds a tag to a SQL template.

CreateRequestDiagnosis.title: CreateRequestDiagnosis
CreateRequestDiagnosis.summary: Initiates an SQL statement diagnostics request.

CreateSqlLogTask.title: CreateSqlLogTask
CreateSqlLogTask.summary: Creates an offline task for Database Autonomy Service (DAS) Enterprise Edition.

CreateStorageAnalysisTask.title: CreateStorageAnalysisTask
CreateStorageAnalysisTask.summary: Creates a storage analysis task to query the usage details of one or more databases and tables.

DeleteStopGateway.title: DeleteStopGateway
DeleteStopGateway.summary: Deletes the metadata of a stopped DBGateway.

DescribeAutoScalingConfig.title: DescribeAutoScalingConfig
DescribeAutoScalingConfig.summary: Queries the configurations of the auto scaling feature for an instance.

DescribeAutoScalingHistory.title: DescribeAutoScalingHistory
DescribeAutoScalingHistory.summary: Queries the auto scaling history of an instance.

DescribeCacheAnalysisJob.title: DescribeCacheAnalysisJob
DescribeCacheAnalysisJob.summary: Queries the details of a cache analysis task.

DescribeCacheAnalysisJobs.title: DescribeCacheAnalysisJobs
DescribeCacheAnalysisJobs.summary: Queries a list of cache analysis tasks.

DescribeCloudbenchTaskConfig.title: DescribeCloudbenchTaskConfig
DescribeCloudbenchTaskConfig.summary: Queries the configurations of a stress testing task.

DescribeHotBigKeys.title: DescribeHotBigKeys
DescribeHotBigKeys.summary: Queries the hot keys and the large keys in the memory in real time.

DescribeHotKeys.title: DescribeHotKeys
DescribeHotKeys.summary: Queries the hot keys of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

DescribeInstanceDasPro.title: DescribeInstanceDasPro
DescribeInstanceDasPro.summary: Queries whether Database Autonomy Service (DAS) Enterprise Edition V1 or V2 is enabled for a database instance.

DescribeQueryExplain.title: DescribeQueryExplain
DescribeQueryExplain.summary: Queries the execution plan of an SQL statement.

DescribeSlowLogHistogramAsync.title: DescribeSlowLogHistogramAsync
DescribeSlowLogHistogramAsync.summary: Asynchronously queries the trend data of slow query logs of an instance.

DescribeSlowLogRecords.title: DescribeSlowLogRecords
DescribeSlowLogRecords.summary: Queries the slow logs of a database instance. You can filter and sort data by multiple conditions.

DescribeSlowLogStatistic.title: DescribeSlowLogStatistic
DescribeSlowLogStatistic.summary: Queries statistical information about slow query logs.

DescribeSqlLogConfig.title: DescribeSqlLogConfig
DescribeSqlLogConfig.summary: Queries the configurations of Database Autonomy Service (DAS) Enterprise Edition that is enabled for a database instance.

DescribeSqlLogRecords.title: DescribeSqlLogRecords
DescribeSqlLogRecords.summary: Queries the log details of a database instance for which Database Autonomy Service (DAS) Enterprise Edition is enabled.

DescribeSqlLogStatistic.title: DescribeSqlLogStatistic
DescribeSqlLogStatistic.summary: Queries the statistics of Database Autonomy Service (DAS) Enterprise Edition.

DescribeSqlLogTask.title: DescribeSqlLogTask
DescribeSqlLogTask.summary: Queries the details of an offline task in Database Autonomy Service (DAS) Enterprise Edition.

DescribeSqlLogTasks.title: DescribeSqlLogTasks
DescribeSqlLogTasks.summary: Queries the audit log tasks of a database instance.

DescribeTopBigKeys.title: DescribeTopBigKeys
DescribeTopBigKeys.summary: Queries the top 100 large keys over a period of time.

DescribeTopHotKeys.title: DescribeTopHotKeys
DescribeTopHotKeys.summary: Queries the top 100 hotkeys over a period of time.

DisableAllSqlConcurrencyControlRules.title: DisableAllSqlConcurrencyControlRules
DisableAllSqlConcurrencyControlRules.summary: Disables all throttling rules that are in effect.

DisableAutoResourceOptimizeRules.title: DisableAutoResourceOptimizeRules
DisableAutoResourceOptimizeRules.summary: Disables the automatic tablespace fragment recycling feature for database instances at a time.

DisableAutoThrottleRules.title: DisableAutoThrottleRules
DisableAutoThrottleRules.summary: Disables the automatic SQL throttling feature for multiple database instances at a time.

DisableDasPro.title: DisableDasPro
DisableDasPro.summary: Deactivates Database Autonomy Service (DAS) Professional Edition.

DisableInstanceDasConfig.title: DisableInstanceDasConfig
DisableInstanceDasConfig.summary: Disables the auto scaling feature for a database instance.

EnableDasPro.title: EnableDasPro
EnableDasPro.summary: Activates Database Autonomy Service (DAS) Professional Edition.

EnableSqlConcurrencyControl.title: EnableSqlConcurrencyControl
EnableSqlConcurrencyControl.summary: Enables SQL throttling to control the numbers of database access requests and concurrent SQL statements.

GetAsyncErrorRequestListByCode.title: GetAsyncErrorRequestListByCode
GetAsyncErrorRequestListByCode.summary: Asynchronously queries the IDs of SQL statements that generate a MySQL error code in the SQL Explorer results of a database instance.

GetAsyncErrorRequestStatByCode.title: GetAsyncErrorRequestStatByCode
GetAsyncErrorRequestStatByCode.summary: Asynchronously queries the MySQL error codes in SQL Explorer data and the number of SQL queries corresponding to each error code.

GetAsyncErrorRequestStatResult.title: GetAsyncErrorRequestStatResult
GetAsyncErrorRequestStatResult.summary: Asynchronously obtains the number of failed executions of SQL templates based on SQL Explorer data.

GetAutoIncrementUsageStatistic.title: GetAutoIncrementUsageStatistic
GetAutoIncrementUsageStatistic.summary: Queries the usage of auto-increment table IDs.

GetAutoResourceOptimizeRules.title: GetAutoResourceOptimizeRules
GetAutoResourceOptimizeRules.summary: Queries the automatic fragment recycling rules of database instances.

GetAutoThrottleRules.title: GetAutoThrottleRules
GetAutoThrottleRules.summary: Queries the automatic SQL throttling rules of a database instance.

GetAutonomousNotifyEventContent.title: GetAutonomousNotifyEventContent
GetAutonomousNotifyEventContent.summary: Queries the details of notification events of a database instance.

GetAutonomousNotifyEventsInRange.title: GetAutonomousNotifyEventsInRange
GetAutonomousNotifyEventsInRange.summary: Queries the notification events of one or more urgency levels within a period.

GetBlockingDetailList.title: GetBlockingDetailList
GetBlockingDetailList.summary: Queries the blocking data of an ApsaraDB RDS for SQL Server instance.

GetDBInstanceConnectivityDiagnosis.title: GetDBInstanceConnectivityDiagnosis
GetDBInstanceConnectivityDiagnosis.summary: Queries the diagnosis of network connectivity when a user accesses a specific database instance by specifying an IP address.

GetDasProServiceUsage.title: GetDasProServiceUsage
GetDasProServiceUsage.summary: Queries the storage usage of a database instance for which Database Autonomy Service (DAS) Enterprise Edition V1 or V2 is enabled.

GetDasSQLLogHotData.title: GetDasSQLLogHotData
GetDasSQLLogHotData.summary: Queries the hot data of audit logs.

GetDeadLockDetail.title: GetDeadLockDetail
GetDeadLockDetail.summary: Queries the details of a deadlock.

GetDeadLockDetailList.title: GetDeadLockDetailList
GetDeadLockDetailList.summary: Queries the deadlock details of an ApsaraDB RDS for SQL Server instance.

GetDeadLockHistory.title: GetDeadLockHistory
GetDeadLockHistory.summary: Queries the historical tasks of recent deadlock analysis and full deadlock analysis.

GetDeadlockHistogram.title: GetDeadlockHistogram
GetDeadlockHistogram.summary: Queries the trend of the number of deadlocks in full deadlock analysis within a specified period of time.

GetErrorRequestSample.title: GetErrorRequestSample
GetErrorRequestSample.summary: Asynchronously queries information about failed SQL queries in SQL Explorer data. You can query up to 20 failed SQL queries within the specific time range.

GetEventSubscription.title: GetEventSubscription
GetEventSubscription.summary: Queries the event subscription settings of a database instance.

GetFullRequestOriginStatByInstanceId.title: GetFullRequestOriginStatByInstanceId
GetFullRequestOriginStatByInstanceId.summary: Collects the full request statistics in the SQL Explorer results of a database instance by access source.

GetFullRequestSampleByInstanceId.title: GetFullRequestSampleByInstanceId
GetFullRequestSampleByInstanceId.summary: Queries sample SQL statements in the SQL Explorer data of a database instance by SQL ID. You can query up to 20 sample SQL statements.

GetFullRequestStatResultByInstanceId.title: GetFullRequestStatResultByInstanceId
GetFullRequestStatResultByInstanceId.summary: Asynchronously collects the full request statistics in the SQL Explorer results of a database instance by SQL ID.

GetInstanceInspections.title: GetInstanceInspections
GetInstanceInspections.summary: Queries the result of an inspection that is performed on a database instance by using the inspection and scoring feature.

GetInstanceMissingIndexList.title: GetInstanceMissingIndexList
GetInstanceMissingIndexList.summary: Queries the details of all missing indexes of an instance.

GetInstanceSqlOptimizeStatistic.title: GetInstanceSqlOptimizeStatistic
GetInstanceSqlOptimizeStatistic.summary: Queries statistics on automatic SQL optimization events within a period of time, such as the total number of optimization events and the maximum improvement.

GetKillInstanceSessionTaskResult.title: GetKillInstanceSessionTaskResult
GetKillInstanceSessionTaskResult.summary: Queries the results of a task that terminates sessions.

GetMongoDBCurrentOp.title: GetMongoDBCurrentOp
GetMongoDBCurrentOp.summary: Queries the current sessions of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB (MongoDB) instance.

GetMySQLAllSessionAsync.title: GetMySQLAllSessionAsync
GetMySQLAllSessionAsync.summary: Asynchronously queries the sessions of an instance and collects statistics on the sessions based on dimensions.

GetPartitionsHeatmap.title: GetPartitionsHeatmap
GetPartitionsHeatmap.summary: Queries access frequency statistics and hot data on partitions of a PolarDB-X 2.0 instance.

GetPfsMetricTrends.title: GetPfsMetricTrends
GetPfsMetricTrends.summary: Queries the trend of a metric for the new version of the performance insight feature of a database instance.

GetPfsSqlSample.title: GetPfsSqlSample
GetPfsSqlSample.summary: Queries the SQL sample data for the new version of the performance insight feature of a database instance.

GetPfsSqlSummaries.title: GetPfsSqlSummaries
GetPfsSqlSummaries.summary: Queries the full request data generated by the new version of the performance insight feature of a database instance based on the SQL ID.

GetQueryOptimizeDataStats.title: GetQueryOptimizeDataStats
GetQueryOptimizeDataStats.summary: Queries information about SQL templates based on query governance data.

GetQueryOptimizeDataTop.title: GetQueryOptimizeDataTop
GetQueryOptimizeDataTop.summary: Queries information about the best-performing and worst-performing instances based on query governance data.

GetQueryOptimizeExecErrorSample.title: GetQueryOptimizeExecErrorSample
GetQueryOptimizeExecErrorSample.summary: Queries the failed SQL statements under a SQL template.

GetQueryOptimizeExecErrorStats.title: GetQueryOptimizeExecErrorStats
GetQueryOptimizeExecErrorStats.summary: Queries SQL templates that failed to be executed.

GetQueryOptimizeRuleList.title: GetQueryOptimizeRuleList
GetQueryOptimizeRuleList.summary: Queries the tags added by the query governance feature to specified database instances.

GetQueryOptimizeShareUrl.title: GetQueryOptimizeShareUrl
GetQueryOptimizeShareUrl.summary: Queries a share URL provided by the query governance feature.

GetQueryOptimizeSolution.title: GetQueryOptimizeSolution
GetQueryOptimizeSolution.summary: Queries suggestions provided by query governance for optimizing an SQL template.

GetQueryOptimizeTag.title: GetQueryOptimizeTag
GetQueryOptimizeTag.summary: Queries the tags of a SQL statement.

GetRedisAllSession.title: GetRedisAllSession
GetRedisAllSession.summary: Queries the current session on an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

GetRequestDiagnosisPage.title: GetRequestDiagnosisPage
GetRequestDiagnosisPage.summary: Queries SQL diagnostics records by pages.

GetRequestDiagnosisResult.title: GetRequestDiagnosisResult
GetRequestDiagnosisResult.summary: Queries the results of an SQL diagnostics task.

GetRunningSqlConcurrencyControlRules.title: GetRunningSqlConcurrencyControlRules
GetRunningSqlConcurrencyControlRules.summary: Queries the throttling rules that are in effect.

GetSqlConcurrencyControlKeywordsFromSqlT.title: GetSqlConcurrencyControlKeywordsFromSqlText
GetSqlConcurrencyControlKeywordsFromSqlT.summary: Generates a throttling keyword string based on an SQL statement.

GetSqlConcurrencyControlRulesHistory.title: GetSqlConcurrencyControlRulesHistory
GetSqlConcurrencyControlRulesHistory.summary: Queries the throttling rules that are being executed or have been triggered.

GetSqlOptimizeAdvice.title: GetSqlOptimizeAdvice
GetSqlOptimizeAdvice.summary: Queries optimization suggestions that are generated by the SQL diagnostics feature of Database Autonomy Service (DAS).

GetStorageAnalysisResult.title: GetStorageAnalysisResult
GetStorageAnalysisResult.summary: Queries the status and results of a storage analysis task.

KillInstanceAllSession.title: KillInstanceAllSession
KillInstanceAllSession.summary: Terminates all sessions on an instance.

ModifyAutoScalingConfig.title: ModifyAutoScalingConfig
ModifyAutoScalingConfig.summary: Modifies the auto scaling configurations of an instance.

ModifySqlLogConfig.title: ModifySqlLogConfig
ModifySqlLogConfig.summary: Enables or configures Database Autonomy Service (DAS) Enterprise Edition for a database instance.

SetEventSubscription.title: SetEventSubscription
SetEventSubscription.summary: Configures the event subscription settings for a database instance.

UpdateAutoResourceOptimizeRulesAsync.title: UpdateAutoResourceOptimizeRulesAsync
UpdateAutoResourceOptimizeRulesAsync.summary: Asynchronously configures parameters related to the automatic fragment recycling feature for multiple database instances at a time.

UpdateAutoSqlOptimizeStatus.title: UpdateAutoSqlOptimizeStatus
UpdateAutoSqlOptimizeStatus.summary: Enables, modifies, or disables the automatic SQL optimization feature for multiple database instances at a time.

UpdateAutoThrottleRulesAsync.title: UpdateAutoThrottleRulesAsync
UpdateAutoThrottleRulesAsync.summary: Asynchronously configures parameters related to the automatic SQL throttling feature for multiple database instances at a time.
